Hello. 
Today i went to cornell with Brigid!
we went to a class
and read mags
and ate...
then we went swimming!
then we ate ice cream
then we left and when i got home i hung out w/ sarah
we went swimming at the Carlsons
then went to Juanitas to eat
(billy got to see Charlie and the Chocolate Factory)!!!! >:-(
JOHNNY DEPP IS SEXXAAYYYYYYYYYYYY!
geez
ok
then we went to barnes and noble
and it was wicked crouded cause of that Harry Potter thing
everyonne looked like a nerd to me....mhmmm
scary
then we got home and now sarahs gone :-(
but i'm probably hanging out w/ her tomorrow and then going to Kathleens house (Family friend)
yeah

Goodbye Buddies,
-Bec
http://monkeybuttrts.livejournal.com/4006.html

Hey Everyone!

todayyyyyyy i was w/ my dad and brother
and i was fighting with billy all day
cause he was being really really annoying.
we went to wegmans and then Home Depot (to get paints for these chairs)
and then billy and me went swimming at the neighbors pool
and we brought out towels into the pool cause there was this HUGE horse fly
and it was freaky
so we put the towel over us and hid from it.
then Brigid came over unexpectedly. lol
and we didd stuff
mostly just read a magazine and she signed my board.
it took about 5 minutes for her to sign it
lol
now i'm painting these chairs w/ billy
and its soooooooo annoying cause of the stupid deer flys!!!!!
grrrrr they are the most annoying thing ever!!!!
ok...first we have to get all the crap off of the chairs
and there are like a billion gazillion caccon things and spiders
its really gross. and then we have to get all of the paint chips off
then we have to paint 2 coats.
!!!!!!!gr!!!!!!!!!!
now i'm taking a break
oh yeah and earlier today 
we dumped out this bucket filled with old grass and water (the water was yellow)
the stuff was in the bucket cause sarah bill and me were doing something...yeah...so anyway i dumped it out
and it smelt worse than crapppppppppppp!
it was the grossest smell EVER!
and then like usual my dogs had to go and roll around in it
then my dad had to give them a bath so the bathroom smells like that grass stuff
its really gross.
ok well i'm off to paint

Goodbye buddies,
-Bec

(i wanna see how many people read  my LJ so if you do then comment please.)
http://monkeybuttrts.livejournal.com/3827.html

HI everyone!
today i went to drumlins w/ sammy!
it was really funnnnnnnnn 
there were some strange people there...
like this lady wearing a dress into the pool.
and a little kid with a una-brow.....yeah...strange
and this girl who was little and she had a bikini on and it was like..above her nipples
hahha sammy!
remember art class emily and sammy!! (nipple) haha
yeah
and then me and sammy were gonna meet this girl there named Ana. and we saw her but we were too scared to go up to her
so when she was leaving sammy was gonna yell her name and go under ...but she didnt
so yeah...
But we had a great time! :-)

well i'm gonna go onto IM
Goodbye Buddies,

-Bec-

Hey Buddies!
Last night i slept out in the tent w/ sarah and bill!!!
it was fun fun fun
we stayed up till like 1 or somethin like that
we were playing this game where we rolled around all over in out sleeping bags
sarah kept rolling over my head..and then my nose felt like it broke
lol
it really hurt!!!!!
yeah....and you don't wanna know what billy was doing
emily...u'd prob. know
hahahahah
then todayyyyyyyyyyy 
we helped sarah pack and played on the computer and organized all her strings
we're gonna make really cool bracelets :-D
but we had to go in the middle of organizing cause sarah had to go somewhere
and now i'm just here. hi.

Goodbye buddies!
--Bec--
http://monkeybuttrts.livejournal.com/2885.html

Hey Everyone. 
I haven't updated in a while cause i was in Maine
it was soooooo fun
i went swimming (froze my butt off!!) ew that'd be weird if someones butt actually did freeze off...ew
i went hiking
kayaking 
shopping 
and beach combing
i was scared of sharks the whole time
lol even though everyone we know in maine was telling me there weren't sharks in maine
and they've lived there they're whole life
but yeah i still thought that there were.
hehe
Billy and me went swimming in this river that emptied out into the ocean
and the water was sooooooooooooooooooooooooo warm
and sooooooooooooo rapid
and we were going up the current to try to get to my dad!
it was so much fun!!!!
but i have so many cuts now :-( cause of the stupid barnicles 
and mosquitos and these other bugs that came through the screen at night!!! 
i have bites all over my legs feets and arms :-(
but otherwise it was awesome

YESTERDAY i got home around 12
then i hung out w/ sarah for the rest of the day until like...8:00
and i went swimming with sarah and bill and sarah was basically tickling me all day
lol.
and then at 8 i went to this 4th of july partayyyyyy
with a bon fire and stuff and i made smores!!! :-)
i love smores! and now i'm in the mood for one. mmmmmmmmmmm.
and we had fireworks!! they were loud

then today i'm gonna do stuff at home till 3 or 4 
and i'm going to my grandparents house for another 4th of july party
and around 8 i'm going to see fireworks with my family and sarah's family!!!!!
i love fire works!!! they're pretty...and loud.


Goodbye Buddies,


--Bec--
http://monkeybuttrts.livejournal.com/2756.html

Hey Everyone!!
I'm excited!! i'm going to Maine in a couple hours!!! YAY
its sooo fun there!
i love it!
my parents were thinking about not bringing the dogs! : ( 
But its like there favorite place!! (except nell has never been there)
but Ivy loves it!
i convinced mom and dad to bring them tho. : )
eexcept i have to take care of them alot...
MAINE IS SOOOOO FUN!!!
we go hiking
shopping
swimming (in the ocean) FREEZING!!!
kayaking
canoeing
and sit on the beach and stuff
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!YES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ok well i'm off to get ready and stuff!
Good Bye Buddies!!!

-Becky

hi.
i haven't updated in a few days
o well
today was pretty funn!!!
i hung out w/ sarah most of the day
we played on the computer, outside, and went swimming!!!! yay
we were playing the sims
i love that game!
except on her computer and my laptop its all slow
the mouse stays on the screen and stuff...
its confusing
and we looked for a snapping turtle and frog in the stream. 
we found them earlier that day (id idn't see the snapping turutle)
but we were trying to find them again
but they ran away  :-( 
i g2g and watch t.v and IM.  
its really cold in my house!! (even tho we don't have AC!!!) i wish we did (on burning days)

-Becky

Hey. Today is Fathers Day!! Happy Fathers day! ok.. well anyway:
I got my daddy an iPod...and we ordered it but it didn't come yet. 
I hope it comes soooooooooooooooon!
Today i went to the mall and got sarah a late b-day present! I hope she'll like it!
and thennnn i went to my grandparents house to celebrate fathers day with all of my mom's side of the family
all of the baby's were there :-)
i love them
and now i'm here
being bored

-Becky

Today i stayed at my grandparents house all day and watched T.V...yeah
there's this really weird show tho...and its really cool..its called Wild Boyz! its kinda sick tho.
these guys like...torture themselves and some of the things they do are freaky and scary

and my cousin Alexia was there too! she's really cute but REALLY shy.she like..the same age as Miya and John-John. my other baby cousins.
Miya is like..obsessed with me..and she has to always go with me. she's sooooo cute
and john-john is like...a tough guy. lol he like..smashes his head on the ground and laughs
haha
yeah..but once Alexias with you for like 20 minutes she's not as shy.
then i came home and billy yelled at me..i'm not sure why..i wasn't really listening
and now i'm talking to people on AIM.

then later tonight we're having people over for dinner
i want sarah to come over too...cause i'll be bored
ok..i'm gonna go and talk to people on IM.

--Becky

Hey.
I'm really bored!!
I'm eating dinner soon..and it smells really really good. mmmm
Today I went to my aunt (Linda)'s house and i saw Miya!!! She's soooo cute!!!!!
she can could to 10 in english and JAPANESE!! and she's...1  and a half years old!!
She's really smart..she know's a billion words!!
then..when i got home i played w/ sarah and bill
we played video games. then went to her house..read her year book..and when on the computer.
the computer was kinda hard to use cause only like...10 keys work. lol. she spilled water on the key board! haha
then we started to re-arange her room. but i had to go home
then i explored my desk. i found some cool stuff that i was missing!! yay!!
ok, well i'm gonna go now and talk to people IM.

~~Bec
